name: com.buildingblocks.unityextensions.materialmanipulator
description:
A set of editor tools for managing materials.
  - The Ripper helps you group and organize Materials for your GameObjects.
  It creates a separate set of Materials for the selected GameObject and its hierarchy,
  allowing you to modify the new Materials in isolation.
  - The Replacer helps you swap out materials throughout a hierarchy. Materials to find
  and matching materials to replace them with index for index.
